thread.title: Moral panic: Japanese girls risk fingerprint theft by making peace-signs in photographs
thread.title_full: Moral panic: Japanese girls risk fingerprint theft by making peace-signs in photographs

author: Cory Doctorow
title: Moral panic: Japanese girls risk fingerprint theft by making peace-signs in photographs
text: Isao Echizen , a researcher at Japan's National Institute of Informatics, told a reporter from the Sankei Shimbun that he had successfully captured fingerprints from photos taken at 3m distance at sufficient resolution to recreate them and use them to fool biometric identification systems (such as fingerprint sensors that unlock mobile phones). (moreâ€¦)
